articles.title: Suspect in assassination of Charlie Kirk arrested on suspicion of capital murder
articles.description: A suspect has been arrested in connection with the assassination of conservative commentator Charlie Kirk. The individual is facing potential charges of capital murder, weapons, and obstruction offenses. The killing has drawn widespread political reaction and commentary.

articles.title: U.N. commission concludes Israel is committing genocide in Gaza
articles.description: A United Nations Commission of Inquiry has concluded that Israel's actions in Gaza amount to genocide. [1, 6] The report cited the scale of killings, aid blockages, and forced displacement as evidence. [1] Israel has rejected the findings, calling the report distorted and false. [1]

articles.title: Heavy rains cause floods in Dehradun's Sahastradhara, two missing
articles.description: Heavy rainfall on the night of September 15, 2025, has led to significant flooding in the Sahastradhara area of Dehradun, Uttarakhand. [1] The floods have caused damage to roads, and the State Disaster Response Force (SDRF) was deployed for rescue operations, assisting over 100 stranded people. [1] Two individuals have been reported missing. [1]
